summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1258, for the improvement of East Forty-third Street, from Brooklyn Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 13775 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
